alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Furnas; Gosper (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 23 at 12:17AM CDT until April 23 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM CDT EARLY THIS MORNING... ...BLOWING DUST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM CDT EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, south winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 70 mph. For the Blowing Dust Advisory, visibility between one quarter mile and one mile in blowing dust. * WHERE...Gosper, Furnas and Dawson Counties. * WHEN...Until 5 AM CDT early this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to reduced visibility. Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Motorists should not drive into an area of blowing dust. Remember, Pull Aside, Stay Alive. People should avoid being outside around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
